list_definition.definition: (with at) to try to take hold of

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I clutched at a floating piece of wood to save myself from drowning.

list_definition.definition: (the pedal operating) a device by means of which two moving parts of an engine may be connected or disconnected

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He released the clutch and the car started to move.
